about.summary: A modern plotting toolkit supporting electronic publishing and reproducibility.

name: toyplot
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "toyplot" %}
{% set version = "0.18.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: f3c07ed64609fa8747210421717b241c808da2fc5d296615c83bf422faca9e90

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - arrow
    - custom-inherit
    - multipledispatch
    - numpy >=1.8.0
    - pypng
    - python
    - reportlab
    - six

test:
  imports:
    - toyplot
    - toyplot.reportlab

about:
  home: "http://toyplot.readthedocs.org"
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE  # Local copy can be removed after https://github.com/sandialabs/toyplot/issues/197
  summary: "A modern plotting toolkit supporting electronic publishing and reproducibility."
  dev_url: https://github.com/sandialabs/toyplot

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dpryan79
